message.content:
<<<api>>>: Content-Disposition header
<<<code>>>: resp.setHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=\"" + filename + "\"");
<<<explanation>>>: To set the filename of the image while writing it to the outputstream, you can use the Content-Disposition header with the "attachment" disposition type. Set the filename parameter to the desired filename. Make sure to properly escape the filename if it contains special characters.
